participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, enjoys storytelling and exploring new ideas.
participant_1.background: I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day. I love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard. I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted. I drink coffee every day. I am headed to university of michigan in the fall.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and nurturing, loves animals and nature, and finds joy in helping others.
participant_2.background: I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training. I bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner. She likes to grow plants in her garden. My cat and I are both deaf, but we still have a great time together. My passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
I am doing well! Thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing great! Thanks! I'm headed to the University of Michigan in the fall, so I'm a little excited and a little nervous!
Oh wow, that's awesome! What are you going to study?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about English or Psychology.
Both of those are great choices! I love English. I also love growing plants in my garden. Do you have any hobbies?
I love writing stories! I also like to drink coffee and play video games.
That's awesome! I love to listen to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training. What's your favorite Beatles song?
I love "All You Need is Love"! It's such a happy and positive song.
That's a great song! I also love "Here Comes the Sun." What are your plans for the weekend?
I'm not sure yet! Maybe I'll go to the park and write some stories.
That sounds like a great plan! I might go to the garden center and buy some new plants
